photographer.name: Alex Morgan
photographer.bio: Award-winning professional photographer and cinematic videographer with over 10 years of experience. Specializing in weddings, travel, sports, and commercial photography. Based in Mumbai, serving clients across India and internationally.
photographer.style: My photography style blends documentary authenticity with artistic elegance. I capture genuine emotions and moments that tell your unique story. Whether it's a wedding, a travel adventure, or a commercial shoot, I bring a cinematic eye to every frame.

seo.defaultDescription: Award-winning photographer and videographer specializing in weddings, travel, sports, events, portraits, and product photography.
seo.keywords: professional photographer, cinematic videographer, wedding photography, travel photography, sports photography, event photography, portrait photography, product photography
